revised_title: The Impact of Oil Industry on Estuarine Ecosystems and Shore Life
tldr: This article discusses the effects of the oil industry on estuarine ecosystems and shore life. It highlights the various ways oil spills can occur, the toxicity of different types of oil, and their impact on salt marshes, rocky shores, and other coastal habitats. The author emphasizes the importance of quick response and effective cleanup methods to minimize the damage caused by oil spills.
